name: Rain Climber
description:
Rain Climber was made by a two-man team for the Ludum Dare 72-hour Game Jam.

Colin the water sprite never did enjoy life inside his puddle. So, on a rainy day, he decided to explore as far as he could - upwards!

Climb between raindrops by aiming leaps using the mouse or thumbstick. Double-jump powerups will give you a limited number of chances to correct your aim, if you can find them.
